title: The Road to Terror: Stalin and the Self-Destruction of the Bolsheviks, 1932-1939
description: This gripping book assembles and translates into English for the first time top secret Soviet documents from 1932 to 1939, the era of the Stalin purges. The nearly 200 documents -- dossiers, police reports, private letters, secret transcripts, and more -- expose the hidden inner workings of the Communist Party and the dark inhumanity of the purge process.
author: J. Arch Getty
